text: Gwyneth Paltrow is edgy. She really, really is. Not convinced? Every year, the actress packs her holiday gift guide with suggestions that are sure to raise eyebrows, from kinky lingerie and sex toys to genitalia grooming kits to drug paraphernalia — but for 2017 she's managed to outdo herself. A section of the Goop gift guide for'lovers,'in particular, really pushes the limits this year, recommending everything from sex toys — 12, to be exact — to pricey lingerie to a pen that delivers THC to the body right before sex.'T is the season! Gwyneth Paltrow's website Goop has released its 2017 holiday gift guide The gold standard in orgasms! In a section for'lovers,
